verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will rejoice and praise the name of Jesus,
To praise Him brings joy to my soul.
I will rejoice and praise the name of Jesus,
To praise Him brings joy to my soul.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will rejoice because Your blood has purchased my salvation
I will rejoice because Your Spirit dwells in me
I will rejoice because my name is written down in heaven
I will rejoice because I'll live with You throughout eternity.
